text: FC Avanhard Lozova () is a former amateur Ukrainian football from Lozova. ==History== The club appeared sometime after 1969.Avanhard Lozova. FootballFacts == Honours == * Ukrainian Amateur Cup ** Winners (1): 1988 ** Runners-up (1): 1989 * Kharkiv Oblast Championship ** Winners (4): 1982,Avanhard Lozova. Footballist Moy. 1983, 1988, 1992 * Kharkiv Oblast Cup ** Winners (6): 1983, 1986, 1987, 1988, 1990, 1991 == References == == External links == Category:Football clubs in Kharkiv Oblast Category:Amateur football clubs in Ukraine Category:Defunct football clubs in Ukraine Category:Lozova
title: FC Avanhard Lozova
